Class DeltaT

java.lang.Object
io.github.ethanlamtt.vietchrono.scale.DeltaT
public final class DeltaT extends Object
Provides deltaT calculations for UT and TT conversion.

This class is instance-controlled, immutable and thread-safe.

Since:
1.0.0
